heading: Thursday Night
text: becoming light east of the Greens Mountains; 5 to 10 mph west of the Greens, gusting to 15 mph in the Champlain Valley, and becoming west in the St. Lawrence Valley.

heading: Cloudy. Showers tapering off early from the Champlain Valley north and west, tapering off by midnight elsewhere; showers could be heavy at times, with thunder possible south. Areas of dense fog overnight. Lows in the mid to upper 50s northeast and in the Adirondacks, upper 50s to lower 60s elsewhere west of the Greens. Winds from the south
text: becoming light east of the Greens Mountains; 5 to 10 mph west of the Greens, gusting to 15 mph in the Champlain Valley, and becoming west in the St. Lawrence Valley.

heading: Friday
text: Areas of dense fog early, then mostly to partly cloudy. Chance of afternoon showers, mainly from the Adirondacks and Route 2 northward, and in the southern Greens. Highs from the upper 60s to mid 70s north, and mid to upper 70s in the south. West winds 5 to 10 mph.

heading: Friday Night
text: Partly cloudy. Areas of valley fog. Chance of an evening shower, mainly north. Lows from the mid 40s to lower 50s. Winds becoming north to northwest around 5 mph, gusting to 10 mph in the Champlain Valley.
